29 inline void swap(QJsonValueRef v1, QJsonValueRef v2)
30 {
31  QJsonValue temp(v1);
32  v1 = QJsonValue(v2);
33  v2 = temp;
34 }

37 // std
39 
40 namespace std {
41 // Even though std::size_t is larger than unsigned int on common 64 bit
42 // platforms, and thus the hash doesn't change across its full length -
43 // this isn't a problem. The standard places no such requirement on a
44 // std::hash implementation.
45 #if QT_VERSION < QT_VERSION_CHECK(5, 14, 0)
46 template<>
47 struct hash<QString> {
48  std::size_t operator()(const QString &v) const noexcept
49  {
50  return (size_t)qHash(v);
51  }
52 };
53 
54 template<>
55 struct hash<QUuid> {
56  std::size_t operator()(const QUuid &u) const noexcept
57  {
58  return (size_t)qHash(u);
59  }
60 };
61 
62 template<>
63 struct hash<rev::Uuid> {
64  std::size_t operator()(const rev::Uuid &u) const noexcept
65  {
66  return (size_t)qHash(u);
67  }
68 };
69 
70 #endif
71 }

74 // rev
76 namespace rev {
77 
78 class Vec {
79 public:
80 
81  // Whether or not the two vectors intersect
82  template<typename T>
83  static bool Intersects(const std::vector<T> & v1, const std::vector<T> & v2)
84  {
85  static std::unordered_set<T> inSet;
86  inSet.clear();
87  inSet.reserve(v1.size());
88  inSet.insert(v1.begin(), v1.end());
89 
90  for (const T& val : v2) {
91  if (inSet.find(val) != inSet.end()) {
92  return true;
93  }
94  }
95  return false;
96  }
97  // The intersection between two vectors
98  template<typename T>
99  static void Intersection(const std::vector<T> & v1, const std::vector<T> & v2, std::vector<T>& intersection)
100  {
101  static std::unordered_set<T> inSet;
102  inSet.clear();
103  inSet.reserve(v1.size());
104  inSet.insert(v1.begin(), v1.end());
105 
106  intersection.reserve(min(v1.size(), v2.size()));
107  for (const T& val : v2) {
108  if (inSet.find(val) != inSet.end()) {
109  // Assume we only have hundreds in output set and therefore
110  // favour a linear search here for cache-friendliness:
111  if (std::find(begin(intersection), std::end(intersection), val) == std::end(intersection))
112  intersection.emplace_back(val);
113  }
114  }
115  }
116 
117  // Variadic template for vector emplace_back forwarding
118  template<typename T, typename ...V>
119  static auto EmplaceBack(std::vector<T> & v, V && ... value)
120  {
121  return v.emplace_back(std::forward<V>(value)...);
122  }
123 
124  // Variadic template for vector emplace forwarding
125  template<typename T, typename ...V>
126  static auto Emplace(std::vector<T> & v,
127  typename const std::vector<T>::iterator& iter,
128  V && ... value)
129  {
130  return v.emplace(iter, std::forward<V>(value)...);
131  }
132 
133  // Variadic template for vector replace forwarding
134  template<typename T, typename ...V>
135  static void Replace(typename const std::vector<T>::iterator& iter,
136  V && ... value)
137  {
138  *iter = { std::forward<V>(value)... };
139  }
140 
141  // Variadic template for list emplace_back forwarding
142  template<typename T, typename ...V>
143  static auto EmplaceBack(std::list<T> & v, V && ... value)
144  {
145  return v.emplace_back(std::forward<V>(value)...);
146  }
147 };
148 
149 class Map {
150 public:
151  // Variadic template for map forwarding
152  template<typename TK, typename TV, typename ...Vals>
153  static auto Emplace(std::map<TK, TV>& map,
154  const TK& k,
155  Vals && ... values)
156  {
157  return map.emplace(std::piecewise_construct,
158  std::forward_as_tuple(k),
159  std::forward_as_tuple(std::forward<Vals>(values)...));
160  }
161 
162  template<typename TK, typename TV, typename ...Vals>
163  static auto Emplace(std::unordered_map<TK, TV>& map,
164  const TK& k,
165  Vals && ... values)
166  {
167  return map.emplace(std::piecewise_construct,
168  std::forward_as_tuple(k),
169  std::forward_as_tuple(std::forward<Vals>(values)...)); // expanding parameters
170  }
171 
172  template<typename TK, typename TV, typename ...Vals>
173  static auto Emplace(tsl::robin_map<TK, TV>& map,
174  const TK& k,
175  Vals && ... values)
176  {
177  return map.emplace(std::piecewise_construct,
178  std::forward_as_tuple(k),
179  std::forward_as_tuple(std::forward<Vals>(values)...)); // expanding parameters
180  }
181 
182 
183  template<typename TK, typename TV>
184  static bool HasKey(const std::map<TK, TV>& map, const TK& k)
185  {
186  return (map.find(k) != map.end());
187  }
188 
189  template<typename TK, typename TV>
190  static bool HasKey(const std::unordered_map<TK, TV>& map, const TK& k)
191  {
192  return (map.find(k) != map.end());
193  }
194 
195  template<typename TK, typename TV>
196  static bool HasKey(const tsl::robin_map<TK, TV>& map, const TK& k)
197  {
198  return (map.find(k) != map.end());
199  }
200 
201 };
202 
204 } // End namespaces
